review.author: Frontend (Agent Teams)
review.findings: Screenshots tab wide panel: panel-wide class toggled only for screenshots tab (62% width). Resize fires post-transition (350ms). Close/reopen preserves wide state correctly. wasWide guard prevents unnecessary resize calls. No transition conflicts. All 6 edge cases verified safe.

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
